ValidationRule.description: Closure Classification when status is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Resolved')), ISBLANK(TEXT( Closure_Classification__c )), OR($RecordType.DeveloperName = "Incident",$RecordType.DeveloperName = "Service_Request") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Classification needs to be filled before Resolving/Closing
